name: Mine Jacks
relicLoreTooltips: These immense jacks are used to prevent the Crucible from collapsing. At the speed the Umbra seems to be mining it, Iâ€™m not sure these jacks will help it.

additionalTooltips.title: [capacity] Capacity
additionalTooltips.description: Units can only be summoned on a floor if it has enough capacity.
